prompt: - Avoid low resolution or pixelated images. - Exclude overly bright or harsh lighting that flattens the scene. - Do not include cluttered backgrounds that distract from the main subject. - Avoid unnatural colors or overly saturated images. - Exclude cartoonish or overly stylized elements that detract from realism. - Do not include awkward poses or expressions that feel forced or unnatural. - Avoid generic or clichéd compositions that lack originality. - Exclude any elements that appear out of focus unless specifically intended for depth of field. - Do not include modern technology or elements that disrupt the historical or thematic setting. - Avoid overly simplistic or bland color palettes that lack depth and richness.
